bug.description:
Sorry if it's off topic. I need this information for my Bachelor task. <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
make own data set try to train CNN on nVidia Jetson nano ( arm processor, 4gb RAM)
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
It should train YoloV3-tiny on my data set <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36884005/78671531-18ada380-78e8-11ea-8034-bc5626332283.png></denchmark-link>
Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: Linux Version 18.04
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
Need to know if this error occurs, because of low memory ( 4gb RAM )?

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/20162021>@20162021</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1G8T-VFxQkjDe4idzN8F-hbIBqkkkQnxw>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/20162021>@20162021</denchmark-link> The shape is not right. Check the cfg file you used.
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
